text:
<!channel>
*Whilst we'll be formally wrapping up our E-Mentoring programme this Friday*, if you & your Student both want to carry on the conversation, you can! Simply connect with them on LinkedIn or give them your contact details :the_horns::the_horns::the_horns:

Thanks again for being part of our pilot so far! We know it has been short & sweet, but we've learned a lot and hope to be running lengthier programmes post-Summer.

>There's no pressure to carry on speaking to your Students after the programme ends. If you no longer can (or don't want to) be involved beyond this Friday :gottarun::gottarun::gottarun:, be sure to round off your discussion and help them complete any outstanding sections of their Career Plan by 11:59pm Friday.

>*A good end is as important as a good beginning for an E-Mentoring relationship!* It's a good idea to reflect on what you've both learned, what you enjoyed / what surprised you and - of course - wish each other all the best for the future! Feel free to share your contact details / add students on LinkedIn if you'd like too!
<@U4V22C6A1> It's been a lot of fun! Seen one finished career plan so far... hopefully another couple if I keep pestering them!
